Desc_ZH: 创建一个简单的“Hello World”函数并在全球节点部署。您可以在后续的代码页面修改函数内容。
Desc_EN: Create a "Hello World" routine and deploy it on global POPs. You can modify the routine later on the Code tab.

Desc_ZH: 使用边缘函数路由流量，对不同版本的线上业务进行验证。
Desc_EN: Route traffic to test services of different versions.

Desc_ZH: 标准URL鉴权方式A，保护站点资源不被非法盗用。
Desc_EN: Use URL signing type A to prevent unauthorized access to your website assets.

children.Desc_ZH: 标准URL鉴权方式A，保护站点资源不被非法盗用。
children.Desc_EN: Use URL signing type A to prevent unauthorized access to your website assets.

children.Desc_ZH: 标准URL鉴权方式B，保护站点资源不被非法盗用。
children.Desc_EN: Use URL signing type B to prevent unauthorized access to your website assets.

children.Desc_ZH: 标准URL鉴权方式C，保护站点资源不被非法盗用。
children.Desc_EN: Use URL signing type C to prevent unauthorized access to your website assets.

Desc_ZH: 由边缘函数代替客户端处理302响应的重定向，即直接跳转至302响应中Location地址。
Desc_EN: Enable a routine to follow 302 redirects from the origin, instead of waiting for further instructions from the clients.

Desc_ZH: 在边缘函数重定向客户端请求，并自定义重定向内容。
Desc_EN: Enable a routine to redirect requests from one URL to another. You can customize the redirect response.

Desc_ZH: 通过子请求Fetch源站资源，拿到响应后修改响应头并返回给客户端。
Desc_EN: Initiate a subrequest to fetch resources from the origin, and, after a response is returned, modify the response header, and serve the response to the clients.

Desc_ZH: 一个简单的边缘存储KV使用示例，帮忙您快速了解KV接口使用流程。
Desc_EN: A simple example to help you understand how to use the Edge KV API operations.

Desc_ZH: 一个简单的CacheAPI使用示例，帮忙您快速了解CacheAPI接口使用流程。
Desc_EN: A simple example to help you quickly understand how to use the cache API.

Desc_ZH: 一个简单的React SSR Demo，帮助您快速了解如实现React SSR
Desc_EN: A simple React SSR demo to help you quickly understand how to implement React SSR
